title: One Piece: Romance Dawn Story
synopsis: The Straw Hat Pirates, searching for the great passage "Grand Line", are in trouble when their food runs out! Luffy, searching for food on his own, finds a ship belonging to the pirate, Gary, and takes it over!! He lands at a nearby town...
characters: ['Monkey D., Luffy', 'Silk', 'Roronoa, Zoro', 'Sanji', 'Nico, Robin', 'Tony Tony, Chopper', 'Usopp', 'Nami', 'Brook', 'Franky']
voices: ['Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Matsutani, Kaya', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Hirata, Hiroaki', 'Yamaguchi, Yuriko', 'Ootani, Ikue', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Okamura, Akemi', 'Cho', 'Yao, Kazuki']
